original_title: Little Pim: Let's Eat! - German for Kids
overview: See Little Pim and friends making and eating food while having fun discovering new tastes. Children will learn more than sixty German words and phrases to use at mealtime. Little Pim is a fun, award-winning series designed to introduce foreign languages to toddlers and preschoolers. Let's Eat features Little Pim, a lovable, animated panda who teaches German to children through a combination of animation, and live action of real kids doing everyday activities.
tagline: See little Pim and friend making and eating food while having fun discovering new tastes. Children will learn more than sixty German words and phrases to use at mealtime.
title: Little Pim: Let's Eat! - German for Kids
